wikitext.*:
'''Måns Björkman Berg''' aka '''Elros''' is a Swedish [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] linguist and member of [[Forodrim|Tolkiensällskapet Forodrim]].

On his webpage, ''[http://at.boktypografen.se/index.html Amanye Tenceli: The Writing Systems of Aman]'', Berg specializes on presentation and discussion of writing systems invented by Tolkien ([[Tengwar]] and [[Sarati]]). 

Berg also works with graphic design, having, for example, created computer fonts based on Tolkien's writing systems and made the design for the Swedish booklet ''[[Alviska fraser]]'' ("Elvish Phrases").<ref>[http://www.elvish.org/gwaith/news_archive.htm News Archive at Elvish.org]</ref>
